      Methods in com.intel.fightclub.dialog.speech with parameters of type AsrExternalConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean ConfidenceUtil.checkConfidence(com.intel.ndg.sdi.cap.asr.results.AsrUtterance topUtterance, AsrExternalConfiguration config)
      Checks the confidence score of the utterance based on the following algorithm: if utterance has 2 or more words return max_over_words_confidence(utterance) > multi-word confidence threshold else if utterance is 1 word if (utterance is special phrase) return special phrase confidence threshold else return max_over_words_confidence(utterance) > single-word confidence threshold end end
